## ZipTools.ZipLoaderViewProps interface

Props for the ZipLoaderView component. Handles loading and importing ZIP archives containing resource files and configurations.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface ZipLoaderViewProps extends ViewBaseProps 
```
**Extends:** [ViewBaseProps](./ts-res-ui-components.viewtools.viewbaseprops.md)
